name: Innermost Secrets
description:
Innermost Secrets is an interactive visual novel made by professional writers, featuring an in-depth story and rich lore.

EDIT: Bugs have been fixed! Please let us know if you find ones we missed.

Credits:

This game was made in seven days for Callum Upton’s horror-themed game jam. This is drebb’s first game jam and Falcon’s first game ever, and we hope you like it! We also got help from Sam Scribbler, who submitted their own game as well!

Due to the non-commercial images and sounds used, under no circumstances can this game be monetized. If this game is available as a paid product anywhere, please contact me @Falcolmreynolds on twitter and discord or @dragonsateyourtoast on tumblr with evidence and I’ll do everything I can to get it removed. This game cannot legally be sold.

CODING & WRITING

Script written and edited by Falcolmreynolds.

Coding done in Ren’Py, primarily by RaptorParty (drebb), with assistance from Sam Scribbler and Falcolmreynolds.

ART

Character sprites were created in Picrew, used for non-commercial purposes, with full credit to the art given to the artists. All art belongs to the artists. Under no circumstances can this game be monetized.

Individual Picrew artists:

Iggy: @Asphyxia17 on Twitter

Alfred: @bestsenpie on Twitter and Instagram

Levi: @yasubaru0 on Twitter 

Ada/Lovelace/Loveless: @ebanoniwa on Twitter (https://twitter.com/ebanoniwa)

Background images for the school taken by Falcolmreynolds at the University of Kentucky.

Title screen image: "Custer County District High School, Miles City" by dave_mcmt is licensed with CC BY 2.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/

Images used in Levi’s minigames:

Day 1: "Craigroyston High School - interior courtyard garden" by Denna Jones is licensed with CC BY 2.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/2.0/

Day 2: "Whale Fall" by OceanNetworks Canada is licensed with CC BY-NC-SA 2.0. To view a copy of this license, visit https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/

Other Photographs: Taken by Falcolmreynolds, Edited by drebb and Falcolmreynolds
